website_summaries.verdict: Industrial style, but not industrial strength. Nevertheless, a strong product with many fans.
pros: Functional and easy to keep clean
Includes a pot filler and a main mechanism
cons: Industrial-style decor will not appeal to everyone

website_summaries.verdict: A commercial-style pull down that lets you access every part of the sink. Best for those who want a professional look.
pros: Sturdy and well built, reaching the corners of the largest sinks
Simple installation for a high-end look

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed. It's brand new
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed. Water pressure and flow at the main faucet is fine, with a flow rate measuring 1.75 GPM. Unfortunately, water flow at the sprayer is less than half that at only 0.75 GPM. I contacted Kraus customer support and I immediately received an automated email telling me, " Rest assured that we will work endlessly to reach your satisfaction". I have not received another response despite having contacted them 3 more times under the same case I.D. [CASE:143130]. I purchase this item for the sprayer. As it is, the sprayer is useless. I would not buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Counterfit Product
customer_reviews.text: This is what I received from the manufacturer after sending them a picture of the product. The cold and hot water were also backwards so we should have figured it out prior to them telling us. " Thank you very much for providing images of your faucet, unfortunately you have purchased a counterfeit product with sub par components"
customer_reviews.author: curlyq

customer_reviews.title: ~2 yr lifespan. Good at first. Then downhill fast.
customer_reviews.text: At first it was great..after a couple of years the flow of the sprayer decreased exponentially. It's just there for looks at this point. Now the water flow when you turn it on causes numerous loud thumps. I took it all apart and nothing obviously broken or clogged. Sick of it. Buying something else to replace it. Total waste of money. Stay away. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: RayK

customer_reviews.title: Pressure dies on sprayer after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much junk all the way around. A good faucet for a short time, then the sprayer slowly dies away to the point where it's not even usable. Can't get it fixed, can't replace the diverter in the faucet to fix the flow problem. Customer support when I bought the unit was completely unresponsive. They appear to have a support department these days, but I still can't get any help now that my faucet is out of warranty. Won't be buying from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Burg

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last save your money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this 5 years ago. We have no kids and eat out often so the faucet gets mild use. First the spray head stopped working then the faucet was interment now totally non functional. It looks great, but the internals are junk. To be sure to clarify we are on a municipal water supply of high quality and have a whole house filter so no junk was in the faucet it just stopped working. I will dissect and find the fault, but glad to see they dont sell this piece of junk anymore.
customer_reviews.author: LHolc

customer_reviews.title: What a faucet enthusiast should know
customer_reviews.text: the pressure is fine until it runs through the handle. The pressure out of the head is worthless. the parts and quality are great. had a profession install and immediately uninstall it as the lack of pressure coming out of the handle was awful. Will find another competitors commercial style faucet. Additionally, the only way to turn off the pre rinse is by the handle faucet itself which isn't adjustable either as in previous models. Kraus needs to improve the pressure and make a valve for the pre rinse arm. returning.
customer_reviews.author: GingyJAC

customer_reviews.title: Not a good faucet
customer_reviews.text: Quite disappointed with this faucet; more specifically the sprayer pressure (non-existent). Sad since this is a great design - the faucet IS MASSIVE. I feel it was great with 2.2+ GPM water pressure, but not so much with the new 1.7GPM. I hope KRAUS addresses this issue - for I did like this faucet. Loved the pot filler - not that part had some pressure and was high enough to get the largest pans/buckets under it. If KRAUS can fix the sprayer pressure to match the Kraus KPF-1650 Nola (I got this one as a replacement) then this will be an awesome faucet.
customer_reviews.author: XTM

customer_reviews.title: High quality manufacture build to last
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the SS model, it is a very solid unit and i installed it using a backing playe underside of the sink for added stabilty. Only comment if I were to change would be to extend the sprayer arm acouple more inches so the sorayer hose wiould Have a uniform bend. No leaks on first attempt.i am happy with the facuet and is thevusland centerpiece. Spray pressure and reach is good for the 30" 10 in deep sink reaches all area. 360 swivel also alllow use in the adjacent separate garage disposal sink. My prior chrome one was very shiny and fingerprints would always require wiping it down.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the money
customer_reviews.text: It is tall, so you need the right sized space. It looks great and is very functional. However: The handle gets painfully hot when hot water runs through it (it is not insulated in any way). We rarely use the pot-filler. We would use the pot filler more if it could have been plumbed separately to our water filter. But, there is only one cold water input, so it pour the same water as out of the main handle. Max water pressure is your line pressure, so the spray from the main handle isn't tremendous. We have a 32 inch sink (Kraus KHU100-32) and the range of the main handle would be insufficient if the sink were any larger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works great! Love the versatility of the spray wand and the raised faucet. Much easier to wash and rinse dishes because you don't have to lower the dishes into the sink to wash or rinse. Wand is also great for rinsing vegetables. A must for under counter mounted sinks with stone (e.g. granite) counter tops since you can fill pots and wash/rinse dishes above the counter top - avoids chipping dishes or the counter top. Have used this faucet for over 12 months and still works and looks like new!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing faucet! It is enormous and goes beautifully with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing faucet! It is enormous and goes beautifully with our large farm sink. While this fits nicely in our home. I would make sure you have a substantial size sink to accommodate the size of this piece. It is truly gorgeous and works beautifully. It is a really ready transition between the sprayer and faucet itself. I love that you can pick the sprayer on for a hands free flow. This faucet really is a statement and great quality to boot!!
customer_reviews.author: William Mason

customer_reviews.title: Quality and NO PLASTIC PARTS
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this faucet. It is very good quality. No PLASTIC! It’s nice looking it functions easily and well. Everything on it is mechanical and not push button. I love it. Especially after having purchased a new faucet from Home Depot a year ago that has leaked and broken due to poor quality and plastic parts that snap and break. This faucet is worth the 200 because it is well made. If it does break, I’ll be back here talking about it. I do recommend this faucet.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful faucet.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this faucet with our stainless steel Kraus sink to match (36in) and they look really good together. We have had it installed for multiple months now and is doing a great job and showing no signs of use. One item of note is that the pot filler will spray if it hits something in the sink. We have butcher block countertops and try to keep water off of the wood so we have to watch that. We typically use the sprayer instead. We compared this faucet to a more expensive Grohe one and found that the Kraus model does not skimp on quality despite being cheaper. We ended up going with the Kraus because of its industrial/commercial look.
customer_reviews.author: 6.0 powerstroke

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Kitchen Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality product and a great addition to your kitchen. Works perfectly, and looks great. If you have a typical stainless steel sink, you may have to reinforce the underside when installing, to make the faucet more stable. You can use a cover plate on the underside as well as the top Also, the pull down handle can get very hot, so you have to be careful where you grab it. There is a hook on the pull down to keep the water flowing without holding it. All in all a great upgrade for your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: Nice focal point for your kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I've had it installed in the house for about a year now and I still love it as much now as the day I put it in. The quality is top notch. It cleans easily and has never given me a single problem. One word of advice: don't mount this to something as flimsy as a stainless sink without bracing it underneath. It's quite heavy and pulling on the sprayer will produce a lot of flex. Even with trying to brace it up with a shaped piece of 1x3 from underneath I ended up having to swap out my sink for a composite granite unit that could handle being pulled on like that.
customer_reviews.author: alon

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it looks but, would not get it again. The faucet is to short causing me to splash out behind the faucet more than I should. You have to continually tight the screws or they fall off and into garbage disposal. My friend has the same brand that is designed differently, thought this was that one. I have had it for 5 years and still works great. I didn't install it so didn't rate that.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine Kanneman

customer_reviews.title: Super durable!
customer_reviews.text: Super durable! This faucet is amazing! My husband and I find that our kitchen is where we spend so much of our time with cooking, baking, brewing, soap making, and so on. SO, we need a faucet that allows us to fill large items and makes cleaning easier overall. This is a great commercial faucet that fits out many faceted needs! We love the dual spout option of having both sides run at the same time if needed. The clip to hook the faucet back in seems better than magnetic ones that seem to lose strength over time.
customer_reviews.author: TeachShea

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this faucet!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, beautiful faucet. I was so pleased to find it for such a great price. My husband had it installed without too much trouble. The hot line ended up being a little short in our case, but I'm not sure that's the normal experience. I've had it a couple of weeks and it's performed wonderfully. There aren't many videos out there on this faucet. I did find one on youtube. This faucet does NOT allow for water flow from both the faucet and sprayer at the same time; however, I highly recommend this faucet. It goes great with out Franke USA commercial sink! It arrived on time and packed in its own very attractive box. Definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made but a little inconvenient.
customer_reviews.text: It's inconvenient that the pot filler does not have a separate turn on lever. I now have to keep the sprayer locked in the on position so that it doesn't switch back to the pot filler between rinsing dishes. I thought that it did have a separate turn on because older models had that, and I had read some reviews that highlighted that feature. Everything else is nice, it's obvious that the faucet is very sturdy and well made, I'm just disappointed that I didn't read this description more carefully to catch the change in design.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Ren

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and big but pressure decreases over time
customer_reviews.text: This was great in the beginning. Loved the look and the design - it was big for sure and that worked well for our kitchen. After the first year, however, the pressure on the spray nozzle decreased considerably, possibly due to hard water. The problem is that I can find no way to clean the nozzle pipe - I've opened the whole thing but still not able to clean it enough to increase pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Gadget

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great looking,  tall, works great.
customer_reviews.text: I LOOOOOVe my faucet! It is shiny, strong, feels good on your hand and cleans easily. It really is beautifull! I installed it in my new deep double stainless steel sink. The water pressure is not as hard as I would want it but we are not sure if the problem is in the faucet or the line. I'm not sure it could ever be hard enough. You can set a lock on the sprayer side and it will come on or release it and the regular faucet side will work. It is nice to have a choice. It is nice and tall and easy to clean the biggest and tallest of pots, pitchers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M

customer_reviews.title: No warranty
customer_reviews.text: Great faucet, Hardware Brand Store is not an authorized retailer for Kraus so Kraus will not honor the warranty. Ended up buying another faucet and had to uninstall this one and send it back. Makes sure you buy from an authorized retailer!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Patrick

customer_reviews.title: so quality and dependability are very important to me to keep my tenants happy and lower my time spent in maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Solid and stylish. Completely metal with flex metal feed lines attached that should be long enough to reach any cutoff valve below sink. This replaced a Peerless model P88103LF that began to leak around the plastic coupler on the hose after 3 months. I did not detect any parts that could leak on the Kraus. It is well made and was very impressed out of the box. It was much easier to install than the Peerless was to uninstall. I own and maintain several rental properties, so quality and dependability are very important to me to keep my tenants happy and lower my time spent in maintenance. Will buy a Kraus product next time too.
customer_reviews.author: J J Spain

customer_reviews.title: a much better sink faucet than what you can get at your ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a much better sink faucet than what you can get at your local Home Depot or Lowes. I do like the look of the faucet and it is pretty useful. But the sink does drip for a few minutes after you stop the water. That part of it is a little annoying. But the pricing was fair for the quality that you get. Not the top of the line faucet that you can get but for someone on a budget and want a relatively nice faucet then this is a good option.
customer_reviews.author: babiesrfatTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great fauset
customer_reviews.text: looks really good in my kitchen....i purchase a generic one like this in the past and it started leaking from the handle a year later. I couldn't find a replacement cartridge for it so that's why I went with the name brand this time...its easier to get replacement parts. The only thing that I see could probably be improved on is the sprayer. If it had more pressure I would have given it five stars....The pressure is not too low but it's not high enough to pressure scum off dishes.
customer_reviews.author: quadre

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - Did Not Last 3 Years
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this about 3 years ago. The sprayer flow decreased more with each passing month. Now, if one uses the sprayer, it sticks and the faucet will not come on. Had a plumber come out and he felt that it was not salvageable. Very disappointing, as cosmetically, it was very nice. It, finally died last week. A complete waste of money. Have now invested in a higher quality competitor and am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: R. McManus

customer_reviews.title: spray head leaks like crazy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this KPF 1602 SS a few days ago. Its a little tall for my liking but is beautiful and the sprayer feels good in the hand BUT the sprayer leaks all over. The sprayer was put together when it came, would that mean someone returned it and I received a faulty one? I had my plumber install it and he scratched it while trying to tighten it! SELLER: Please advise how to fix this problem
customer_reviews.author: Sandra O.

customer_reviews.title: It's huge.
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy, this thing really makes a statement in your kitchen. The hardware looks to be of high quality, and because the sprayer hose isn't stored under the faucet, it creates less clutter under the sink. All of the fittings are metal and come with one or more washers/grommets for a nice seal. Installation tip: make sure you have a big adjustable wrench for the big main locknut. It was much larger than the one on the Moen I replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very solid faucet that looks great in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Very well made faucet. Had it professionally installed and the plumber had no issues. This faucet is tall, so make sure it will fit under your cabinet if that is your set up. The only thing I wish it had is a diverter so that you could use the sprayer without running the regular faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M MacArthur

customer_reviews.title: Substantial well made good value
customer_reviews.text: After reading several negative reviews I was hesitant to order this faucet at first. Considering there was a large number of reviews that were mostly positive I decided to order the faucet. Came in 3 days and upon opening the box I was impressed. I installed it easy. I have been using it for 3 months now and love it. Time will tell but right now I am impressed with the size, quality and value of this item. Don't be afraid to buy this faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Crush60

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup but heavy. Mine leans slightly forward which is annoying as you cannot really move the wand out of the way because it just falls back to the center. I would ideally like the sprayer to have more pressure, it is a bit light. Looks really nice and profession, but just not as strong of a spray head as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful faucet and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful faucet and excellent quality. I didn't expect this to be so nice, works beautiful and the customer service from Kraus was top notch. I had a flow problem with the first one so I sent them a 5 second video and they sent me a brand new one no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Faucet Ever & Fantastic Price !!!
customer_reviews.text: We remodeled our kitchen from the ground up... I wanted a faucet that was strong as Commercial and had the Updated Spark to complete my dream kitchen. This was the "Perfect" faucet! Every one who has viewed my New kitchen cabinets & granite counter tops etc... stops at our sink and has to touch it, and admire it! Im pleased at its performance as well. The price was Fantastic! I did a lot of compating to Other Big Name Brands... IM SO PLEASED WITH THIS FAUCET! IT WAS THE BEST CHOICE!
customer_reviews.author: ~ Ms K ~

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy install, beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a faucet that would reach pans and beer making equipment and I was tired of faucets that didn't have enough clearance or reach. I am also very picky about faucets and bath accessories. When I lived in Europe the faucets, towel racks, etc were solid and heavy duty, yet beautiful. Here in the US its tough to find good solid construction in kitchen/bath items and they are usually made of cheap light weight flimsy pot metal or sheet metal. I typically only buy American or European, but this faucet is good quality. It was easy to install, and works like it should. My second choice would have likely been Grohe or Hans Grohe.
customer_reviews.author: Master Po

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat this for the price! Well mad and looks and functions just as expected. Very easy to install, took me about 30 minutes including taking off the old faucet (which was the most difficult part). The only thing I wish it had was a diverter valve to allow you to keep water going to the sprayer when the water is on. This would keep the water from running through the main faucet when doing dishes allowing you to control when you want the water on/off by squeeze of the handle. Overall, a great faucet, great quality, and fraction of the price of others!
customer_reviews.author: T. Cloud

customer_reviews.title: nicely finished but it developed drips pretty quickly in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed this 4 years ago. The finish has endured but it did develop dripping/unwanted flow on the faucet side after about a year, when using the sprayer. That has been a come and go issue. Most recently the flow rate on the sprayer side has markedly dropped off while the faucet head maintains full flow, I'm trying to figure out how to correct that. There is no evidence of calcium build up, etc, and our water is good quality so I'm not sure what that is about.
customer_reviews.author: manson l root

customer_reviews.title: You need a sturdy sink to hold the weight but well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this faucet. I could use a bit more water pressure but that is not the faucets problem but my cheap plumbing. The metal on the sprayer will get quite warm as you use it with hot water so be sure your hands are on the protective grip when using. I also suggest the buyer also make sure they have a sturdy sink before purchasing because it does weigh a bit and will wobble on a cheap metal sink. We reinforced under the sink but still have wobble and are purchasing a replacement well-built sink to compensate. The faucet's on lever is normally full-on each time; very touchy; it will splash but I don't mind that.
customer_reviews.author: Painted Shadows

customer_reviews.title: good unit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Around two years ago. Because of its low price I was skeptical as to whether or not it would be good. But two years in and I’m very pleased that it is still functioning fine, all looks good and has had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Uber Mommie

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Has a tall profile. Definitely commercial style & quality. Dual faucets are a nice feature. Sprayer works great. Downside: Water hand valve doesn't function smoothly. It's either too much water flow or not enough. Can't get the sweet spot. But overall, happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Slacker81

customer_reviews.title: Makes the Kitchen Look "Upscale"
customer_reviews.text: I bought a brand new 1602 SS from Ebay, but the flow rate was only 1/2 gallon per minute. The Kraus service rep told me that it was probably defective (and now I have seen some reviews that confirm that some units have very low flow rates). Fortunately, the Ebay seller gave me a full refund. I then installed a brand new 1602 SS from Amazon, and it has the correct 2 gallon per minute flow rate. We're thrilled with our replacement stainless steel Kraus. Other faucets contain "metal looking" plastic parts, but not this one. It really makes the kitchen look "upscale".
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Very poor water flow :-(
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic build quality, fit and finish, easily serviceable, but very poor water flow pressure. I removed the flow restrictor in the sprayer and it help a little but is still very low pressure.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: extremely heavy duty, easy 1 person install ...NOTICE, it is very tall, but not intrusive. water flow slightly restricted(could be from the debris screens in the inlet hoses?) works well
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Heavy duty and beautiful finish
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Heavy duty and beautiful finish. Great quality! There's so many other cheap faucets that are this style at the big box hardware stores....don't waste your time and money. I'm very happy with the stainless steel finish. Install was really easy. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Maxwell-Cook

customer_reviews.title: This is very tall
customer_reviews.text: Don't underestimate how tall this is. If you have a tight or small space, this will dominate it. Other than its size, no complaints on how it works. Jury is out, I may buy a smaller one, oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Scrim

customer_reviews.title: The Kraus handle is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I have installed several of these Kraus handles in kitchens and they are awesome. Combine it with a deep basic sink and you have a game changer for your kithen.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Just got it installed and it looks beautiful. There is an issue with the cartridge and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got it installed and it looks beautiful. There is an issue with the cartridge and the cold water isn't working properly but I called customer service and they shipped out a new one same day. Once I get that and get it replaced I'll give it 5 stars if I get some longevity out of it .
customer_reviews.author: Abhrams

customer_reviews.title: Liars - "Powerful pre-rinse spray" the sprayer is merely an ornament.
customer_reviews.text: Nearly useless, the spray is no more than a trickle and it takes hat seems like forever to fill a pot from the main faucet. I quote the ad on Amazon, "Powerful pre-rinse spray" it is not even useful as a pre-rinse as it has no power to move anything. It is an outright lie.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: WOW!  WOW!  WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is totally beautiful and awesome in every way! The plumber that installed it was in awe! I bought this for my friend that runs a dog rescue and just happens to be an awesome gourmet cook! Hands down, this is the best gift I have ever given! She loves the sprayer for all sorts of messy dishes and I coupled this item with the iTouchless EZ Faucet PRO Automatic Touch-Free Faucet Adaptor and a touchless soap dispenser to make her dog rescue duties easier and faster AND I suspect she will be cooking me dinner ALOT this year! hehehe
customer_reviews.author: dawgpaula

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and purposeful!
customer_reviews.text: Since my husband does the dishes, he was allowed to choose the new sink and faucet. I was originally concerned about the height of the faucet as we have an open floor plan and the sink faces the living room, while it is noticeable, it looks like art and is cool to look at! My husband is very happy with it and believes after the months of searching, he made the right choice. It was very easy to install as well, it took the plumber 20 minutes from opening the box to throwing out the trash!
customer_reviews.author: CeoBred

customer_reviews.title: I love this faucet
customer_reviews.text: I love this faucet, but we had to have our replaced with the warranty as a valve inside let go and water would come out of both the handle and the pot filler at the same time. The same thing started happening to our replacement faucet right away. I believe there is a newer model that repaired this issue but for now we will have to keep having ours warranty replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Levandoski

customer_reviews.title: We're extremely happy. I'll update with any changes in quality or ...
customer_reviews.text: We installed this in our custom kitchen. I was ready to drop over $1,000 on a designer faucet when a friend talked me into trying this brand. The quality of the metal is outstanding -- it fits with all our pro Viking appliances. Looks and feels very high end. Functions very well. We're extremely happy. I'll update with any changes in quality or opinion, but so far, we're very satisfied with this fixture in our high-end kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Grace

customer_reviews.title: Kruas hit a home run with this Kitchen faucet.
customer_reviews.text: I just finished the kitchen remodel. This has been in use for a week now we all love the quality. This is a top end Faucet.. The feel of the sprayer is solid heavy duty construction and the on/off valve is smooth as silk. I would expect this king of quality for this price. Defiantly not cheap..I do wish the sprayer pressure was a bit stronger. I know the water pressure here is good so the reduced pressure is done by the faucet.. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a high end upgrade..
customer_reviews.author: no one

customer_reviews.title: Love this faucet
customer_reviews.text: It is taller than I expected and I was concerned that was going to be an issue. It isn't. Install was very easy. It was harder getting the old faucet out. I love the design and the fact that the pressure is perfect. It is nice to finally have a hose that has pressure instead of dealing with a diverted valve that gobies out. I have been wanting one of these types of faucets for years but I couldn't find one that didn't have a plastic spray head. Well I found it in this model and it didn't cost me $600.
customer_reviews.author: Jenhaas

customer_reviews.title: This faucet looks nice, but its operation is complicated and not very ...
customer_reviews.text: This faucet looks nice, but its operation is complicated and not very practical. First off, the sprayer on the end is so heavy, it eventually starts bending the hose that feeds the main sprayer, which weighs a ton in my opinion. The sprayer is solid, but makes the whole thing so unwieldy that it's hard to use. With it being so top heavy, it produces a lot of leverage on the places where the parts are put together, and where it is mounted to the sink. Looks great, not so useful.
customer_reviews.author: Torx2112

customer_reviews.title: Love this faucet!
customer_reviews.text: I really researched several faucets for quite awhile. I couldn't make up my mind. I finally decided on the Kraus. It's very well made, and it was so easy to put together. I always cringe when my hubby has to do something around the house, because something always goes wrong. I think it took him all of five minutes to install!! That's incredible. We now have better water pressure, and I dont have to fight witht he stupid weight that used to hang under the sink. It is big, but I don't care! It works very well. Never thought I'd get so excited over a faucet.
customer_reviews.author: PWalls

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 month but so far great
customer_reviews.text: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder so either this is your style or not . Practical yes.If you cook you will love this.As I said I have no long term experience but the other similar tap I purchased from E bay for 1/3 of the cost was garbage as the stainless steel finish wore and the hose cut my fingers.Looked good on purchase but cheep no good good no cheep. This appears to be well built and the dual spray heads is great. So far I'm happy and I was reluctant to shell out this much coin but so far it has been a 100% improvement on my cheaper E bay purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MiniMe

customer_reviews.title: Great modern/industrial looking faucet assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this about a month ago and no issues as yet. The unit seems very well constructed, it's heavy and moveable parts move very smoothly. The sprayer unit has an impressive heft to it as well and is very handy! Overall a very good value, it is huge though, you should have a lot of space for this as it's around 2' tall. Installation was a breeze, hardest part was removing the old faucet assembly. This utilizes just one hole so I used the Hansgrohe 14019001 chrome baseplate which worked great and looks made for it. Overall I highly recommend if you have the space for it.
customer_reviews.author: J.Anderson

customer_reviews.title: We use it for our commercial sink.
customer_reviews.text: We had this unit for about 6 months in our production area. This unit gets used daily. It is defiantly not good for industrial or commercial usage. Residential will probably last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: David Sheen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Addition to our Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic faucet! I don't know how it does it, but the water pressure seems to be significantly increased from the previous faucet (which was a nice Moen faucet). Build quality seems to be very, very solid and we could not be happier. The one thing that took us a bit by surprise is the size...we have a fairly large sink area and this thing is pretty darn big! You may want to consider the dimensions for your kitchen, but that's not a complaint, just a suggestion to consider.
customer_reviews.author: BBQ Phil

customer_reviews.title: Terrible water pressure
customer_reviews.text: We've had this faucet for 4 years and from day one, it's been a hassle. We finally called a plumber to have it taken out and replaced. The water pressure from it is terrible and takes forever to fill anything up. Our water pressure from the rest of the house is fine. It's just this one faucet. It's pretty but not useful.
customer_reviews.author: Marie-Anne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful amazing faucet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful amazing faucet!!! Outstanding quality!!! Easy install!!! What a show piece!!! I really shopped around for this and agonized over my decision to purchase this one...but nothing else I looked at can even compare to this faucet. If you're thinking about buying this don't even think you will not regret it
customer_reviews.author: WINDYROYAL

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is great for the budget minded consumer who wants a commercial quality faucet. To feel "solid" I had to tighten the lock thread over and over (tighten, rest, tighten, rest, repeat until it wouldn't tighten any more, then screw the 3 screws, tightly. Once I did that it felt very stable, and it has worked flawlessly ever since (no movement whatsoever). My wife and I couldn't be happier. It is a great faucet once installed properly (if the person installing it isn't "strong", then invite a friend over who is). It is truly a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Help Ful

customer_reviews.title: The wobble is real
customer_reviews.text: I was woking on a tiny tiny house kitchen and this is the largest thing in the room. Its worth it. works best with an undermount sink. and it works best when its not attached to the sink. that wobble people are talking about is real.
customer_reviews.author: UmmYa

customer_reviews.title: Good Price Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for a new faucet like this for some time. price or quality seemed to keep us from making the purchase. When I looked at this one I thought the price was great but questioned the quality so I went straight to the reviews. WOW, almost everyone rated it a 5 and there were a lot of rating so I thought we needed to give it a try. I'm adding my 5 star rating. Both Price and quality are fantastic. It is so user friendly, no small or cheap breakable parts it's very solid and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very happy after a month
customer_reviews.text: Perfect right out of the box. I've had this faucet for about a month and it works great! I have good water pressure and the sprayer has great force.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great looking faucet, ok pressure
customer_reviews.text: Installation for this faucet was easy. It is a nice and sturdy faucet. My boyfriend is a chef and wanted an industrial style faucet in the kitchen. With the new version of this faucet you can't use the pot filler and sprayer at the same time. The spray pressure is ok. I was hoping for a little more power. Overall it is a great looking faucet. It just needed a but more pressure for the sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: best faucet ever
customer_reviews.text: I catch my wife standing at the sink just spraying water down the drain, okay, so she is also rinsing the vegies but still, easy on the water! All kidding aside, this is the best faucet I have seen of this kind. It splashes less than the standard faucet head, easy to fill pots, wash vegies and fruit and its two faucet system works in a way that the flow does not change when you use both at the same time. Set your temp with the mixer valve and pull the trigger, no more trying to find that sweet spot since it can be that way every time.
customer_reviews.author: monster

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Falls apart within a few months; do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is the worst. Fell apart within a few months. And wasn't even labeled with the brand name sold as! "The junkiest piece of junk ever." -exasperated girlfriend.
customer_reviews.author: dan b.

customer_reviews.title: Simply stunning!
customer_reviews.text: You will be amazed! I absolutely love my faucet. I was scared it would be too big for my kitchen or stand out like a sore thumb. It is stunning! I love the pot filler and absolutely love how flexable the sprayer is. Fairly easy to install and the directions were clear. Packaged nicely and a name worth trusting. I loved my faucet so much I hunted down a sink also made by Kraüs and I could not be happier with the results.
customer_reviews.author: hm86

customer_reviews.title: How can you live without the faucett and the deep farmhouse sink.
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is amazing and even better with the kraus 33" farmhouse sink. Absolutely perfect!! The only change i would have made was to go with the 36" kraus farmhouse sink. More effort on my end with rebuilding the cabinet width, but would have been awesome. I clean more than ever with this. Seldom use the dishwasher because it makes it simple ****ALSO note it does not limit your water pressure, so you have awesome power**** can even fill a pot with one and clean with the other at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: warren hagen

customer_reviews.title: the Hot water stop work at the 2nd week
customer_reviews.text: The design is very unique, it looks kind of cool with a modern kitchen. At beginning everything works fine but at 2nd week, the hot water start to flow very weak. I call my plumber to check it out, and he swap the cold water to the hot water side to tested. the cold water flow is very weak. so the plumber think something wrong from the internal parts inside the faucet which he can't do anything about it. So we have to return it!
customer_reviews.author: PK9394Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good.
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it!! Will see with time if it holds up. But works very well and no leaks... yet. Had some bad experiences with a prior faucet purchased on amazon leaking in our newly remodeled kitchen. We tried this and have had it a few months and it is going strong! Will update later....
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful faucet. Easier to install than it was to remove the old one! Installation was easy because I had to do only two things under the sink: secure the faucet to the sink and hook up the water. The rest of the installation was topside. Not sure why people are not satisfied with the flow rate. It's no high pressure fire hose, but it's certainly adequate. I'd been looking at this faucet for a couple of years. Wish I'd bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Plaid Man

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Faucet
customer_reviews.text: Want a wow factor when you go in your kitchen. Very affordable way. This faucet is awesome. Second one I’ve purchased for my second home. Great!
customer_reviews.author: JSanMartin

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Solid as a rock- super easy to install- high quality- we absolutely love it- no problems with pressure or function- it is a life long product. I even posted a YouTube review- if your on the fences don't hesitate to buy this product- this is definetly the one
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful faucet
customer_reviews.text: I love this faucet and feel it looks better in real life as opposed to the photo. It is a great quality as well as being very well priced. I appreciate the long reach of the sprayer. This faucet looks great in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Klflorida

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is exactly what is looks like in the pictures; a stunning master piece of a kitchen faucet. It functions as perfectly as it looks. Another huge factor in me writing this review is the superb customer service provided by Kraus. After a couple of years of use with our very hard well water I called to ask where to buy a new valve cartridge. Kraus shipped me a new cartridge absolutely free! Not to mention the staff was very apologetic and polite. I was in a better mood after I called than before. This is a rare situation as we all know all too well! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! The best!
customer_reviews.text: Once installed It seemed too toll and I even thought of returning it, but I've changed my mind after a few days. It is great - very convenient in use and modern looking. Now I cannot imagine how i could use any other faucet ever. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ShopperX

customer_reviews.title: Very well made product
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before a purchase, and this faucet has held up for 3 years, and is still great. Love the design and quality. If I were to be really picky, would say that the water pressure out of the sprayer is not very strong, but adequate for home use. Overall great product. Do not hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jesterj

customer_reviews.title: What disappointed me, however
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate the exceptional build quality of this product, and despite living overseas I received it in less than a week. What disappointed me, however, was the weak flow of water from the sprayer. There is no trouble with the flow coming from the spout, but when I use the sprayer, the water just trickles. And it seems like I'm not the only buyer who has encountered this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and excellent faucet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sink in Cancun a couple of years ago and I am happy with the quality. The weather destroys everything and it works like a muchas gracias. Necesito ir primero a la tienda de comida para gatos.. The only problem I have is that the water drips from the faucet when I'm using the sprayer. I have adjusted, but it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Los

customer_reviews.title: Good product, would like more pressure from spray head.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this today, I removed the restrictor on the inlet of the spray head but still low pressure, house has amazing pressure so it's something else in the faucet. Overall though it looks and works well with my new sink. If I can figure a way to get more flow I'll definitely disassemble and do it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low pressure. Can't knock a crumb off a plate.
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is terrible. We should have paid attention to the reviews that clearly stated that pressure is very low. This faucet can barely knock a crump off a plate.
customer_reviews.author: Honor

customer_reviews.title: A functional sculpture for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product. This is a sculpture for the kitchen. It works magnificently and is an elegant and functional addition to my kitchen. I thought it might look too industrial/commercial and be too big. It isn't at all. This is my 3rd Kraus product. I also have a Kraus sink and faucet in my guest bath. They are well made and well priced. My plumber also thinks the products are superb. Thanks, Kraus.
customer_reviews.author: C. Trout

customer_reviews.title: Love this faucet
customer_reviews.text: Love this faucet! It is unique and works and looks great. Has a very high quality feel, very solid & industrial. Very easy install - about 15 minutes. Only one minor criticism: The spray from the squirter is not a very strong stream. I paired it with two dispensers: one for soap, one for lotion. Would definitely order again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Flynner

customer_reviews.title: One minor issue, but we love it!
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is great! My only complaint is that couple of times, the knob where you turn the water on and off, has gotten slightly unscrewed, making it loose. I then just tighten it and problem solved. For the price, I feel like that shouldn't happen. Also, please note that this faucet is tall. Incredibly tall. It fits well in our kitchen but upon installation, it was a little shocking how tall it stood.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S.

customer_reviews.title: I have had this in place for some time now ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this in place for some time now. It works, but causes a thump sound in the water line when shut off from full power. No sound from the normal spout, just the spray side. Also, the plastic broke off where it goes into the holder and now it doesn't always stay put in the holder arm. Plenty of volume from the spray to wash things off.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Maltby

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and so well made!
customer_reviews.text: Whooo wee...I bought this and the zero radius sink also by Kraus, and what a beautiful combo!! Very well made with ALL metal parts- no plastic anywhere. Packaged like there was fine crystal in the box! Even my granite installers commented on how I have a "professional chef kitchen"...!!
customer_reviews.author: Best price diva

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my! Words cannot describe how much I LOVE this faucet! Installed fairly easy and works to perfection! I cook all my meals separate from my family because of food allergies, so I am always cleaning copper and All Clad pots and pans. They do not go in the dishwasher! This gem of a faucet allows me to run my kitchen like a smooth running commercial establishment. Calgon take me away!
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Amazon sent me a previously returned facet!
customer_reviews.text: I deducted a start because the 1st one Amazon sent us was a previous return! It was bent not in a Kraus box and had broken parts. Unacceptable Amazon since you sourced this item! That said the second one was in a Kraus box with no broken parts, installed easily, and looks great. Just know that this thing is fairly tall!
customer_reviews.author: Walter Whitesell

customer_reviews.title: A bit ostentatious, but I like it
customer_reviews.text: Installation was simple enough, no special tools required. The only issue is that the connection between the base and the riser bar is a bit wobbly. Sprayer works well, the pot filler is very handy. I would recommend to others. 10/3/2013 update - we have been using the faucet for over 1 month and the base (handle area) and riser junction wobbliness is getting worse. A complete review of the instructions shows no info on how to tighten. It is on the verge of being unacceptably loose. I'll update if it gets worse or if I figure out how to address this. Do to this issue, I have lowered rating from 4 to 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J Hermann

customer_reviews.title: One of the best things I have done for myself in a good ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I have done for myself in a good while, love this faucet hope I never have to replace it and if I do hope there is another like it out there.
customer_reviews.author: MJA

customer_reviews.title: Great tap but if you are buying from overseas check you can get flexihose converters from USempirical to what your country uses
customer_reviews.text: Great tap! Well made and good quality finishing. The top spray function automatically diverts from the tap when engaged. Only issue is that the flexi-hose screw connector is US empirical and didn't match anything in Australia where we live (AUS/NZ metric). I contacted Kraus who didn't sell any converters. No plumbing store had anything that matched (3/8 npt is NOT the same as 10mm bsp!) I ended up going to a tool maker to custom manufacture 2 converter fittings at $100 each (you need 2 for the hot and cold pipes) which was unexpected an a significant extra cost. But now it's working and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: XLNT value!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this faucet. Not only does it NOT leak, but its quiet, doesn't splash, and was easy to install. The only drawback (not really) is that it takes water while to get to the Faucet end. A real good buy!
customer_reviews.author: 001Gorgeous

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product, not disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Well engineered product. The spray head has a built in latch to keep it on and control with the on off value when needed. The spray is very focused though the volume of water is very good thought not the same as in a resturant. It keeps spray from splashing all over on engergic task. The other fauct has a steady stream of water and much larger volume of water that my other faucet. It works a good as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: A. Durand

customer_reviews.title: Installation was straightforward and relatively easy (even behind a deep well sink)
customer_reviews.text: Tall, extremely well built faucet. Installation was straightforward and relatively easy (even behind a deep well sink). Installed four months ago into a thick concrete countertop, it has been maintenance free since. Middle of the market priced, it easily performs as well as the $700-800 versions.
customer_reviews.author: Maya and Vince Pack

customer_reviews.title: The 1st one I received did leak but I contacted Kraus and they were AWESOME enough to send me a new one upon verifying ...
customer_reviews.text: The product has a lifetime warranty. The 1st one I received did leak but I contacted Kraus and they were AWESOME enough to send me a new one upon verifying my purchase from Amazon. High quality item we use in our new kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Max B.

customer_reviews.title: Work Horse. L. O. V. E.  best!
customer_reviews.text: I read somewhere how ma y times per day one uses their sink. it is a crucial kitchen tool. I ordered the shiney stainless. my entire kitchen is brushed stainless and it is a ***** to keep clean. I thought the shine would bother my OCD wirh the satin stainless sink. NOPE. it's beautiful. it is strong. the pot filler is amazing. the spray has a study handle AnD and small hook to keep it in the spray position. I cook daily and have been in culinary field for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Good!
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is REALLY good. See my other review of another one.  You use this thing everyday and it's brilliant. It's heavy. Variable water flow. Useful. My best buy in a long time. About splashing, you need a deep sink but if you don't have one, it sprays water based on the pressure you apply. Something you use like this everyday better be good. It is.
customer_reviews.author: Marky Mark

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I was stalking this faucet for months before finally purchasing it right when our house was built. And I am so glad I did. The stainless steel goes perfectly with our brand new kitchen and just adds character to the space. Love that the spray is pretty strong and the whole thing is very manueverable. It's a little intimidating for guests but it's also a conversation piece. Could not be happier with it!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

product_meta.title: Kraus KPF-1602SS Single Handle Pull Down Kitchen Faucet Commercial Style Pre-rinse, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
The best kitchen ideas start with great design. Kraus commercial style faucets feature a unique industrial aesthetic that creates a dramatic look with contemporary appeal. Each best selling faucet is constructed with certified lead-free brass and top-quality components, including a high performance / low flow Neoperl aerator and a precision Kerox ceramic cartridge for reliable drip-free use. With a choice of flawless commercial grade stainless steel or chrome finish, this faucet matches many popular fixtures and appliances, resulting in a beautifully coordinated look for your kitchen. For flexible functionality, this ultra modern faucet has a pull-down spray head and side pot filler. Single-hole mounting allows the faucet to integrate seamlessly with your sink. For easy installation, all mounting hardware is provided. Experience Kraus Quality and bring your best kitchen ideas to life.

Benefits & Features

 * Lead-Free Brass Construction w/ Superior Rust-Resistant Finish
 * LiteTouch Single-Lever Flow Control
 * Heavy-Duty Commercial-Style Spring Design
 * Integrated Two-Way Diverter for Smooth Flow Control
 * Powerful Pre-Rinse Spray
 * Spout Swivels for Complete Sink Access
 * Easy-Clean Rubber Nozzles Prevent Hard Water Build-Up
 * Kerox Ceramic Cartridge (tested w/ 500,000 cycles)
 * High Performance / Low Flow Neoperl Aerator
 * Limited Lifetime Warranty
 * Certified and Listed by cUPC , UPC, NSF, ANSI, AB1953, CALGreen, FTC, DOE, CEC, MASS, CSA, IAPMO, SCC, and ADA
 * Faucet Height: 29"-32"
 * Spout Height: 11.5"
 * Spout Reach: 8.5"
 * Spout Swivel: 360 degrees
 * Flow Rate: 1.8 GPM
 * Faucet Hole Size Requirement: 1.375"
 * Number of Holes Required: 1
 * Maximum Deck Thickness: 1.75"



FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Kraus is a leading kitchen sink manufacturer, with a wide range of products made with advanced technology to exceed industry standards. To ensure exceptional quality, Kraus products are always made with premium materials as well as cutting-edge designs. All Kraus products are created with an eye for fashion as well as function, with an emphasis on quality craftsmanship and functional design. The focus is always on providing outstanding value to all Kraus customers, and making it affordable to create a kitchen they love.

"Love this sink! I bought this sink from Amazon about a year ago and it has been a great addition to our kitchen. It is large enough to soak our largest roasting pan. It is a workhorse. Made extremely well. The sound proofing construction dulls the echoing type sound that most stainless steel sinks have. MONEY WELL SPENT!"
feature_bullets: FAUCET HEIGHT 32.13 inch: heavy duty commercial style spring design. Width is 9.50 inch and Hose Length is 31.50 inch
POWERFUL PRE RINSE: high arc spout equipped with a powerful sprayer
POT FILLER: multi task with minimum effort by filling your pot right at the stove
SINGLE HANDLE FAUCET: precise temperature and flow control
DURABLE: lead free, corrosion resistant brass construction
